weapon_description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
weapon_skill_description: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 10% more DMG and take 2%  more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
